root: ^Mrs. Rosa, could you show me the contents of your bag?
^I don't have to show you anything! You're not even a real detective.
^(I can never be a real detective.)
^(No matter how hard I try, no matter how many cases I solve. My past is too dark...)
^(Oh Benny, I wish you were here with me.)
^(Even a glimpse of your face would make me feel better.)
^Ma'am, surely there's no reason to be so defensive. Unless you're hiding something.
^Oh, Rosa, honey. It's okay. We have nothing to hide... snooze.
